name: Slink
description:
SLINK

Theme: You are isolated from the outside world and everyone is avoiding you. 

The room you are in is procedurally generated, you wont find a way out. Try and survive the isolation as long as you can and beat your Highscore. You loose blood every second so you need a lot of blood to keep going. The rarer the little one the more Points and Blood it gives.

Rarity

Top to Bot the frequency gets lower, gives more points and more HP.

 

Controls

Move: WASD

Dash: Space

Pause: Esc

Done for the AI and Games Jam

Credits

Level Generator: HeartBeast

Sound Effects: SubspaceAudio

Awesome Music: skrjablin and nene
